name: The Treasure Room
description:
This room is richly ornamented.  The walls have been carved to show
people dancing around a moon which is drawn on the floor.  It looks very
old, and it is very dusty.  To the south you see the back side of a secret
door.

exits.description: You can see a picture with some peeple crawling around a huge moon.
exits.keywords: moon door~ 1 -1 7315 S #7317 The Square Lair~    You are standing in the south-east part of the lair.  You can see a skeleton lying in the corner.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like a adventurer who wasn't lucky.  You'd better watch out...
